description: What is this? https://www.ncrunch.net/documentation/guides_distributed-processing NCrunch is an automated concurrent testing tool for Visual Studio.  It intelligently runs automated tests so that you don't have to, and gives you a huge amount of useful information about your tested code, such as code coverage and performance metrics, inline in your IDE while you type.
summary: NCrunch is an automated concurrent testing tool for Visual Studio.  It intelligently runs automated tests so that you don't have to, and gives you a huge amount of useful information about your tested code, such as code coverage and performance metrics, inline in your IDE while you type.
author: Remco Software Ltd.
